verses.verse: And the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> <S%H1696>spake<s%> unto <S%H4872>Moses<s%>, <S%H559>saying<s%>,

<S%H1696>Speak<s%> unto <S%H175>Aaron<s%>, and <S%H559>say<s%> unto him, When thou <S%H5927>lightest<s%> the <S%H5216>lamps<s%>, the <S%H7651>seven<s%> <S%H5216>lamps<s%> shall give <S%H215>light<s%> over <S%H6440%H4136>against<s%> the <S%H4501>candlestick<s%>.

And <S%H175>Aaron<s%> <S%H6213>did<s%> so; he <S%H5927>lighted<s%> the <S%H5216>lamps<s%> thereof over <S%H4136%H6440>against<s%> the <S%H4501>candlestick<s%>, as the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> <S%H6680>commanded<s%> <S%H4872>Moses<s%>.

And this <S%H4639>work<s%> of the <S%H4501>candlestick<s%> was of <S%H4749>beaten<s%> <S%H2091>gold<s%>, unto the <S%H3409>shaft<s%> thereof, unto the <S%H6525>flowers<s%> thereof, was beaten <S%H4749>work<s%>: according unto the <S%H4758>pattern<s%> which the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> had <S%H7200>shewed<s%> <S%H4872>Moses<s%>, so he <S%H6213>made<s%> the <S%H4501>candlestick<s%>.
¶ And the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> <S%H1696>spake<s%> unto <S%H4872>Moses<s%>, <S%H559>saying<s%>,
<S%H3947>Take<s%> the <S%H3881>Levites<s%> from <S%H8432>among<s%> the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%>, and <S%H2891>cleanse<s%> them.

And thus shalt thou <S%H6213>do<s%> unto them, to <S%H2891>cleanse<s%> them: <S%H5137>Sprinkle<s%> <S%H4325>water<s%> of <S%H2403>purifying<s%> upon them, and let them <S%H8593%H5674>shave<s%> all their <S%H1320>flesh<s%>, and let them <S%H3526>wash<s%> their <S%H899>clothes<s%>, and so make themselves <S%H2891>clean<s%>.

Then let them <S%H3947>take<s%> a <S%H1121%H1241>young<s%> <S%H6499>bullock<s%> with his meat <S%H4503>offering<s%>, even fine <S%H5560>flour<s%> <S%H1101>mingled<s%> with <S%H8081>oil<s%>, and <S%H8145>another<s%> <S%H1121%H1241>young<s%> <S%H6499>bullock<s%> shalt thou <S%H3947>take<s%> for a sin <S%H2403>offering<s%>.

And thou shalt <S%H7126>bring<s%> the <S%H3881>Levites<s%> <S%H6440>before<s%> the <S%H168>tabernacle<s%> of the <S%H4150>congregation<s%>: and thou shalt <S%H6950>gather<s%> the whole <S%H5712>assembly<s%> of the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%> <S%H6950>together<s%>:

And thou shalt <S%H7126>bring<s%> the <S%H3881>Levites<s%> <S%H6440>before<s%> the <S%H3068>LORD<s%>: and the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%> shall <S%H5564>put<s%> their <S%H3027>hands<s%> upon the <S%H3881>Levites<s%>:

And <S%H175>Aaron<s%> shall <S%H5130>offer<s%> the <S%H3881>Levites<s%> <S%H6440>before<s%> the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> for an <S%H8573>offering<s%> of the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%>, that they may <S%H5647>execute<s%> the <S%H5656>service<s%> of the <S%H3068>LORD<s%>.

And the <S%H3881>Levites<s%> shall <S%H5564>lay<s%> their <S%H3027>hands<s%> upon the <S%H7218>heads<s%> of the <S%H6499>bullocks<s%>: and thou shalt <S%H6213>offer<s%> the <S%H259>one<s%> for a sin <S%H2403>offering<s%>, and the <S%H259>other<s%> for a burnt <S%H5930>offering<s%>, unto the <S%H3068>LORD<s%>, to make an <S%H3722>atonement<s%> for the <S%H3881>Levites<s%>.

And thou shalt <S%H5975>set<s%> the <S%H3881>Levites<s%> <S%H6440>before<s%> <S%H175>Aaron<s%>, and <S%H6440>before<s%> his <S%H1121>sons<s%>, and <S%H5130>offer<s%> them for an <S%H8573>offering<s%> unto the <S%H3068>LORD<s%>.
Thus shalt thou <S%H914>separate<s%> the <S%H3881>Levites<s%> from <S%H8432>among<s%> the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%>: and the <S%H3881>Levites<s%> shall be mine.

And <S%H310>after<s%> that shall the <S%H3881>Levites<s%> go <S%H935>in<s%> to do the <S%H5647>service<s%> of the <S%H168>tabernacle<s%> of the <S%H4150>congregation<s%>: and thou shalt <S%H2891>cleanse<s%> them, and <S%H5130>offer<s%> them for an <S%H8573>offering<s%>.

For they are wholly <S%H5414>given<s%> unto me from <S%H8432>among<s%> the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%>; instead of such as <S%H6363>open<s%> every <S%H7358>womb<s%>, even instead of the <S%H1060>firstborn<s%> of all the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%>, have I <S%H3947>taken<s%> them unto me.

For all the <S%H1060>firstborn<s%> of the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%> are mine, both <S%H120>man<s%> and <S%H929>beast<s%>: on the <S%H3117>day<s%> that I <S%H5221>smote<s%> every <S%H1060>firstborn<s%> in the <S%H776>land<s%> of <S%H4714>Egypt<s%> I <S%H6942>sanctified<s%> them for myself.
And I have <S%H3947>taken<s%> the <S%H3881>Levites<s%> for all the <S%H1060>firstborn<s%> of the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%>.

And I have <S%H5414>given<s%> the <S%H3881>Levites<s%> as a <S%H5414>gift<s%> to <S%H175>Aaron<s%> and to his <S%H1121>sons<s%> from <S%H8432>among<s%> the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%>, to <S%H5647>do<s%> the <S%H5656>service<s%> of the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%> in the <S%H168>tabernacle<s%> of the <S%H4150>congregation<s%>, and to make an <S%H3722>atonement<s%> for the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%>: that there be no <S%H5063>plague<s%> among the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%>, when the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%> come <S%H5066>nigh<s%> unto the <S%H6944>sanctuary<s%>.

And <S%H4872>Moses<s%>, and <S%H175>Aaron<s%>, and all the <S%H5712>congregation<s%> of the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%>, <S%H6213>did<s%> to the <S%H3881>Levites<s%> according unto all that the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> <S%H6680>commanded<s%> <S%H4872>Moses<s%> concerning the <S%H3881>Levites<s%>, so <S%H6213>did<s%> the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%> unto them.

And the <S%H3881>Levites<s%> were <S%H2398>purified<s%>, and they <S%H3526>washed<s%> their <S%H899>clothes<s%>; and <S%H175>Aaron<s%> <S%H5130>offered<s%> them as an <S%H8573>offering<s%> <S%H6440>before<s%> the <S%H3068>LORD<s%>; and <S%H175>Aaron<s%> made an <S%H3722>atonement<s%> for them to <S%H2891>cleanse<s%> them.

And <S%H310>after<s%> that <S%H935>went<s%> the <S%H3881>Levites<s%> in to <S%H5647>do<s%> their <S%H5656>service<s%> in the <S%H168>tabernacle<s%> of the <S%H4150>congregation<s%> <S%H6440>before<s%> <S%H175>Aaron<s%>, and <S%H6440>before<s%> his <S%H1121>sons<s%>: as the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> had <S%H6680>commanded<s%> <S%H4872>Moses<s%> concerning the <S%H3881>Levites<s%>, so <S%H6213>did<s%> they unto them.
¶ And the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> <S%H1696>spake<s%> unto <S%H4872>Moses<s%>, <S%H559>saying<s%>,

This is it that belongeth unto the <S%H3881>Levites<s%>: from <S%H6242>twenty<s%> and <S%H2568>five<s%> <S%H8141>years<s%> <S%H1121>old<s%> and <S%H4605>upward<s%> they shall go <S%H935>in<s%> to <S%H6633%H6635>wait<s%> upon the <S%H5656>service<s%> of the <S%H168>tabernacle<s%> of the <S%H4150>congregation<s%>:
And from the <S%H1121>age<s%> of <S%H2572>fifty<s%> <S%H8141>years<s%> they shall <S%H7725>cease<s%> <S%H6635>waiting<s%> upon the <S%H5656>service<s%> thereof, and shall <S%H5647>serve<s%> no more:

But shall <S%H8334>minister<s%> with their <S%H251>brethren<s%> in the <S%H168>tabernacle<s%> of the <S%H4150>congregation<s%>, to <S%H8104>keep<s%> the <S%H4931>charge<s%>, and shall <S%H5647>do<s%> no <S%H5656>service<s%>. Thus shalt thou <S%H6213>do<s%> unto the <S%H3881>Levites<s%> touching their <S%H4931>charge<s%>.
